sentences.sentence: We do not proscribe any prayer.
sentences.translation: 我们不排斥任何的祷告。

sentences.sentence: So I would have to proscribe every single aspect of my career, from my logo to the clothes that I wear.
sentences.translation: 所以我不得不拒绝每一个有关我的事业的简单的方面，从我穿的衣服的商标。

sentences.sentence: UML does not proscribe any particular software development method or process; it merely standardizes the form of notation.
sentences.translation: UML 没有排斥任何特殊的软件开发方法或过程；它只不过标准化了标记法的格式。
